subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Towson erupted for 21 straight points to break a halftime tie and beat Fordham in the F.C.S. playoffs, but the Rams’ feeling of accomplishment was overwhelming.
snippet: Towson erupted for 21 straight points to break a halftime tie and beat Fordham in the F.C.S. playoffs, but the Rams’ feeling of accomplishment was overwhelming.
